content:
# FACTORY REPORT

## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Power Generation System at Position(-9.5, -0.5)
Consists of:
- Offshore pump (position: -9.5, -0.5)
- Boiler (position: -5.0, 2.5) with coal fuel
- Steam engine (position: 0.5, 6.5)
- Connected by pipe groups for water and steam
- Small electric poles for power distribution

### Iron Ore Mining and Smelting at Position(15.5, 70.5)
Consists of:
- Electric mining drill (position: 15.5, 70.5)
- Wooden chest for ore collection (position: 15.5, 72.5)
- Burner inserter to move ore (position: 16.5, 72.5)
- Stone furnace (position: 19.0, 73.0)
- Burner inserter for output (position: 20.5, 73.5)
- Wooden chest for iron plates (position: 21.5, 73.5)
- Burner inserter to move iron plates to belt (position: 22.5, 73.5)
- Transport belt connecting to circuit assembler

### Copper Ore Mining and Smelting at Position(-46.5, 70.5)
Consists of:
- Electric mining drill (position: -46.5, 70.5)
- Wooden chest for ore collection (position: -46.5, 72.5)
- Burner inserter to move ore (position: -45.5, 72.5)
- Stone furnace (position: -43.0, 73.0)
- Burner inserter for output (position: -41.5, 73.5)
- Wooden chest for copper plates (position: -40.5, 73.5)
- Burner inserter to move copper plates to belt (position: -39.5, 73.5)
- Transport belt connecting to copper cable assembler

### Copper Cable Production at Position(-34.5, 73.5)
Consists of:
- Assembling machine 2 (position: -34.5, 73.5) with copper cable recipe
- Burner inserter for input (position: -37.5, 73.5)
- Burner inserter for output (position: -31.5, 73.5)
- Wooden chest for copper cables (position: -30.5, 73.5)
- Burner inserter to move copper cables to belt (position: -29.5, 73.5)
- Transport belt connecting to circuit assembler

### Electronic Circuit Production at Position(-19.5, 60.5)
Consists of:
- Assembling machine 2 (position: -19.5, 60.5) with electronic circuit recipe
- Burner inserter for iron plate input (position: -21.5, 60.5)
- Burner inserter for copper cable input (position: -17.5, 60.5)
- Burner inserter for output (position: -19.5, 62.5)
- Wooden chest for electronic circuits (position: -19.5, 63.5)
- Transport belt network connecting from iron plates and copper cables

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when placing entities too far away
- Make sure to move closer to the target location before placing entities
- The maximum placement distance is 10 units from player position

### Errors when placing entities on unsuitable terrain
- Avoid placing entities on water or other unplaceable terrain
- Check the area before attempting to place assembling machines or other large entities
- For large entities like assembling machines, verify that the entire footprint is on valid terrain

### Errors when placing entities where items are on the ground
- Clear items from the ground before placing entities in that location
- Items on the ground can block entity placement

### Errors when connecting entities incorrectly
- Transport belts cannot be connected directly from chests
- Use an inserter to take items from a chest before connecting to a belt
- When connecting pipes, ensure there is a valid path between source and target
- Check that all connection points are unblocked when connecting fluid systems

### Errors when placing entities where other entities already exist
- Verify the target location is clear before placing an entity
- Use get_entity() to
